text: Anger Management is a 2003 American slapstick comedy movie directed by Peter Segal. It was written by David S. Dorfman. It stars Adam Sandler, Jack Nicholson, Marisa Tomei, John Turturro, and Woody Harrelson. It was produced by Revolution Studios. It has cameo appearances of Rudy Giuliani, Bob Sheppard, and Derek Jeter. It was released to positive reviews on April 11, 2003. ==Other websites== * * * * * Category:2003 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Movies directed by Peter Segal Category:Columbia Pictures movies
title: Anger Management (movie)
